channel.title: Help With RunServer
channel.description:
I'm kind of new to coding. But I've tried adding an npc but. when people log in the screens black and when I run server it says [code]Expection in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsExpection: 2 at NPCHandler.loadNPCList<NPCHandler.java:1529> at NPCHandler.<init><NPCHandler.java:21> at server.main<server.java:28>[/code]
Help?

item.title: Help With RunServer
item.dc:creator: @F00L_I_K0 F00L I K0
